name: Out of Place (48h Game(s))
description:
The game is about sad little penguin, who feel out of place in his home because he can not swim like the others. He wanders sadly across frozen land and finds himself a magic stone allows him to change seasons.

The game is produced for a game jam that we joined a bit late and only had about 48h to complete it.
We hope you can enjoy our little puzzle game

Controls
movement: WASD or arrow keys
season change: space
restart: R
mute audio: M

Our team:

Bartosz Bielinski - programmer and self proclaimed project manager
Arkadiusz Kucmierz - programmer
Michal Czech - artist; 3d assets
Magdalena Jurek - artist; 2d art

Music:
Intro: Slow Motion - Bensound
Game: Night Vision - Bird Creek
